Plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.
Title: When Harry Met Sally...
Actors: Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Carrie Fisher, Bruno Kirby
tomatoConsensus: Rob Reiner's touching, funny film set a new standard for romantic comedies, and he was ably abetted by the sharp interplay between Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 15 nominations.
